alert.note: Alert for Cascade (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 6:13PM MDT until July 08 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cascade County in central Montana... * Until 700 PM MDT. * At 613 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cascade to 13 miles south of Belt, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Great Falls, Cascade, Belt, Black Eagle, Fort Shaw, Fort Shaw, Portage, Eden, Sluice Boxes State Park, Malmstrom Afb, Stockett, Tracy, Vaughn, First Peoples Buffalo Jump State Park, Centerville, Sun River, Tower Rock State Park, Armington, Ulm and Sand Coulee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
